name: Plus+-Minus
description:
Plus+-Minus was made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2021! The theme was Joined Together. So I created a platform game where you can only level up if Plus and Minus are together. And the two have to help each other to get to the end.


Controls:

•   Arrow Keys = Move and Jump

•   X = Change Character

Tips:

•   Plus and Minus can jump on their heads.

•   The Gem is an extra collectible.

•   You can only level up if Plus and Minus are at the door together.

Tools Used:

•   Construct 2 (game engine)

•   Piskel (pixel art) 

✨Thank you so much for playing my game!! I'm really happy to participate in the GMTK Game Jam 2021. It was really hard, I'm literally 14 years old, but I made it and I hope you enjoyed it.
